yourFutureBoss.title: Your Future Boss is Looking for Oracle Fusion Experts!
yourFutureBoss.shortDescription: Companies are actively hiring Oracle Fusion SCM professionals. Don’t miss the opportunity to be in demand—start learning today!

sectionOne.title: Meet Our Founder  & Your Trainer
sectionOne.shortDescription: Mr. Krishna, a seasoned professional with over 20 years of extensive experience across diverse projects and industries, is driven by an unwavering passion for sharing knowledge and transforming students into skilled, industry-ready professionals. With a clear vision to produce top-tier Oracle Fusion Supply Chain consultants who can meet the ever-growing global market demand, our founder firmly believes that knowledge is not only a powerful tool for individual financial growth but also a catalyst for career transformation. By equipping individuals with the right skills and guidance, he aims to empower them to uplift their families, secure better futures, and actively contribute to the growth of the economy.

faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Fusion SCM Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle Fusion SCM Training includes a comprehensive curriculum covering Product Management,Inventory Management, Procurement,  Order Management and Costing. For a detailed module breakdown, please refer to our course syllabus.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: The training sessions are conducted Monday to Saturday, with each class lasting 1 hour per day to ensure an interactive and structured learning experience.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer weekend batches. Our live sessions run Monday to Saturday to provide a consistent learning flow.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide recorded sessions for learners who prefer a self-paced learning approach. However, doubt clarification sessions are not available for self-paced training.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer internships based on your performance in mock evaluations, helping you gain real-world experience in Oracle Fusion SCM.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single SCM Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, our Oracle Fusion SCM training is structured as a comprehensive course, and individual modules cannot be taken separately.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we assist with resume preparation to help you showcase your skills effectively. Our expert team will guide you in creating a professional, job-ready resume tailored to Oracle SCM roles.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: yes, having a Laptop or Desktop is essential to access the Oracle instance and complete hands-on exercises efficiently.

faqs.question: Are there any prerequisites or minimum qualifications required for the Oracle Fusion SCM Training?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is required! We cover everything from the basics. However, if you have knowledge of Oracle EBS R12, Logistics, or Supply Chain, it will be an added advantage. The course is open to all graduates, including those with a Degree, PG, B.Tech, etc.

faqs.question: Do you teach from the basics?
faqs.answer: Yes, we teach from the basics and progress to advanced concepts. This makes the Oracle Fusion SCM Online Training suitable for both freshers and experienced professionals. No prior experience is required to enroll.

faqs.question: Do you provide job placement assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we support your job placement journey by conducting mock interviews, resume preparation, and career guidance. Additionally, we have tie-ups with several companies, including Hitachi Vantara, Evosys, NTT Data, Tech Mahindra, LTI, AAIS, FIS Global, Splash BI, and Innovacx.

faqs.question: Do you provide support for Oracle Certification?
faqs.answer: Yes, we guide you through the Oracle Fusion SCM certification process, offering expert advice and sample dumps to help you prepare effectively.

faqs.question: Do you provide training recordings and study materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide daily session recordings through our learning portal, along with module-wise soft copy materials that include screenshots and navigation guidance.

faqs.question: Do you provide interview questions and assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide module-wise latest interview questions and assist with interview preparation through mock interviews.

faqs.question: Do you provide instance or application access for practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide 6 months of instance access for practice. No software installation is required—just access through a URL link.

faqs.question: Can I Retake This Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, once you register for the Fusion SCM Cloud Online Training course, you will receive a 1-year membership, allowing you to attend multiple batches of the Oracle SCM Cloud Online Training.

faqs.question: Can I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide a Course Completion Certificate upon successfully finishing the training.

faqs.question: Is Any Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No, coding or programming knowledge is not required. This is a completely non-coding and functional course.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer one-on-one training upon request. Please note that the pricing for personalized training is higher compared to group sessions.
